basics.name: Matt Shirley
basics.summary: Software Developer with 3+ years of expertise in test automation and front-end development experienced with JavaScript and Ruby.

highlights: Developed unit and integration tests for back-end web services (JavaScript)
Reduced customer complaints by developing a tool to automate repetitive tasks for the Care and Biomedical teams (Ruby)
Tested Android and iOS applications, back-end services and internal tools
Fixed defects and annoyances for a large React project (JavaScript)
Supported the implementation of a video chat service using React and Twilio (JavaScript)
Improved development confidence by implementing component tests (JavaScript)
Performed manual regression and exploratory testing
Implemented and maintained an automated end to end test framework (JavaScript, Python)
Reduced the time to create and populate test environments by developing a data generation tool (JavaScript)
Guided an accessibility culture within the company and developed testing guidelines to satisfy regulation and compliance
Simplified the test approach by implementing a risk-based exploratory testing methodology to reducing testing cycle by five days
Taught and mentored testers in automation, test processes and penetration testing

work.summary: Took a sabbatical for a year and a half to travel Canada, freelance and study.
highlights: Developed small web applications for clients using React and Ruby on Rails
Continued contract employment with Asia Pacific Digital providing technical consultation
Increased throughput of SMS messages by redesigning the queueing algorithm (PHP)
Resolved defects for a messaging and email platform (JavaScript, SQL)
Liaised with delivery partners to reduce the cost per SMS send to under 4 cents
Communicated with internal and external users to provide troubleshooting, technical support and resolve billing issues

education.summary: Coursework focused on databases, full-stack development, testing planning and project management foundations
